### parseAlignment() {#a352f4ca101ae014677dda708b07b98f7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Error parseAlignment (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> &amp; Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, bool AllowZero=false)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Attempts to parse an alignment component of a specification.

On success, returns the value converted to byte amount in <code>Alignment</code>. If the value is zero and <code>AllowZero</code> is true, <code>Alignment</code> is set to one.

Return an error in a number of cases:
<ul>
<li><code>Str</code> is empty or contains characters other than decimal digits;</li>
<li>the value is zero and <code>AllowZero</code> is false;</li>
<li>the value is too large;</li>
<li>the value is not a multiple of the byte width;</li>
<li>the value converted to byte amount is not not a power of two.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00310">310</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/datalayout-cpp">DataLayout.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>-&gt;isOpaque() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot get layout of opaque structs&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IsPadded = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NumElements = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop over each of the elements, placing them in memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = NumElements; i != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a92f4283d4e0e2ea1776894b3ae93640f">e</a>; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>-&gt;getElementType(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i == 0 &amp;&amp; Ty-&gt;isScalableTy())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StructSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a5fd620f2446d1a4cb0d55a12d182bb34">TypeSize::getScalable</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> TyAlign = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>-&gt;isPacked() ? <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1) : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getABITypeAlign(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add padding if necessary to align the data element properly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently the only structure with scalable size will be the homogeneous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scalable vector types. Homogeneous scalable vector types have members of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same data type so no alignment issue will happen. The condition here</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assumes so and needs to be adjusted if this assumption changes (e.g. we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// support structures with arbitrary scalable data type, or structure that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contains both fixed size and scalable size data type members).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!StructSize.isScalable() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(TyAlign, StructSize)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IsPadded = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StructSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a003b4369b4130e669dc9139798e0193c">TypeSize::getFixed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(StructSize, TyAlign));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of maximum alignment constraint.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StructAlignment = std::max(TyAlign, StructAlignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    getMemberOffsets()&#91;i&#93; = StructSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consume space for this data item</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StructSize += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add padding to the end of the struct so that it could be put in an array</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and all array elements would be aligned correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!StructSize.isScalable() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(StructAlignment, StructSize)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IsPadded = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StructSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a003b4369b4130e669dc9139798e0193c">TypeSize::getFixed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(StructSize, StructAlignment));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// getElementContainingOffset - Given a valid offset into the structure,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// return the structure index that contains it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a331caeb70809f50e71528de06fba7b66"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a331caeb70809f50e71528de06fba7b66">StructLayout::getElementContainingOffset</a>(uint64&#95;t FixedOffset)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!StructSize.isScalable() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot get element at offset for structure containing scalable &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;vector types&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a003b4369b4130e669dc9139798e0193c">TypeSize::getFixed</a>(FixedOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;TypeSize&gt;</a> MemberOffsets = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a2d7a4f50f59fe9b6c235016cd7900f55">getMemberOffsets</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::upper&#95;bound(MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>(), MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> LHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> RHS) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         return TypeSize::isKnownLT(LHS, RHS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> != MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Offset not in structure type!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  --<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#a338ba7ca7a526243ab1853d07d90fe38">TypeSize::isKnownLE</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;upper&#95;bound didn&#39;t work&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> == MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>() || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#a338ba7ca7a526243ab1853d07d90fe38">TypeSize::isKnownLE</a>(&#42;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> - 1), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#addaa86bfa4ca26b7f366cbdd868f99bf">TypeSize::isKnownGT</a>(&#42;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> + 1), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Upper bound didn&#39;t work!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiple fields can have the same offset if any of them are zero sized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, in &#123; i32, &#91;0 x i32&#93;, i32 &#125;, searching for offset 4 will stop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at the i32 element, because it is the last element at that offset.  This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the right one to return, because anything after it will have a higher</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset, implying that this element is non-empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> - MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Attempts to parse an alignment component of a specification.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// On success, returns the value converted to byte amount in \\p Alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the value is zero and \\p AllowZero is true, \\p Alignment is set to one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return an error in a number of cases:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\p Str is empty or contains characters other than decimal digits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - the value is zero and \\p AllowZero is false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - the value is too large;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - the value is not a multiple of the byte width;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - the value converted to byte amount is not not a power of two.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310" lineLink="#a352f4ca101ae014677dda708b07b98f7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="#a352f4ca101ae014677dda708b07b98f7">parseAlignment</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> &amp;Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllowZero = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Str.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(Name + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; alignment component cannot be empty&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, create the struct layout.  Because it is variable length, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// malloc it, then use placement new.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout">StructLayout</a> &#42;L = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout">StructLayout</a> &#42;)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8bb931812d78f470d4ca775ac8b88e61">safe&#95;malloc</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set SL before calling StructLayout&#39;s ctor.  The ctor could cause other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entries to be added to TheMap, invalidating our reference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SL = L;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#acf0b1898efd7f81a078e9288befd9290">getTypeSizeInBits</a>(Ty).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#a33880aaca0ad05e5f1557f079305bde5">getFixedValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa81eb67f09ee4944eaeeddbc54c0c0de">lower&#95;bound</a>(FloatSpecs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>, LessPrimitiveBitWidth());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != FloatSpecs.end() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;BitWidth == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> abi&#95;or&#95;pref ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;ABIAlign : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;PrefAlign;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we still couldn&#39;t find a reasonable default alignment, fall back</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a simple heuristic that the alignment is the first power of two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// greater-or-equal to the store size of the type.  This is a reasonable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// approximation of reality, and if the user wanted something less</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// less conservative, they should have specified it explicitly in the data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// layout.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> / 8));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a5e9e1c0dd93557be1b4ad72860f3cbdaa98aa825426dd4de2d19a3de9983a2d5d">Type::FixedVectorTyID</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a5e9e1c0dd93557be1b4ad72860f3cbdaa6188e4e2fb839d904debf0cbe7fc11f6">Type::ScalableVectorTyID</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#acf0b1898efd7f81a078e9288befd9290">getTypeSizeInBits</a>(Ty).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#ac4ab9dd9440c55bee1aa4a1195cee759">getKnownMinValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa81eb67f09ee4944eaeeddbc54c0c0de">lower&#95;bound</a>(VectorSpecs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>, LessPrimitiveBitWidth());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != VectorSpecs.end() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;BitWidth == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> abi&#95;or&#95;pref ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;ABIAlign : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;PrefAlign;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By default, use natural alignment for vector types. This is consistent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with what clang and llvm-gcc do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re only calculating a natural alignment, so it doesn&#39;t have to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on the full size for scalable vectors. Using the minimum element</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// count should be enough here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#acfcd22eb38dbfe1acbf138754297437a">getTypeStoreSize</a>(Ty).getKnownMinValue()));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// getPreferredAlign - Return the preferred alignment of the specified global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This includes an explicitly requested alignment (if the global has one).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#abc7937248226859bf5a5d64a28c8269f"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#abc7937248226859bf5a5d64a28c8269f">DataLayout::getPreferredAlign</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;GV)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> GVAlignment = GV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#a115ac0121663aa8365e095d095d0c633">getAlign</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a section is specified, always precisely honor explicit alignment,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so we don&#39;t insert padding into a section we don&#39;t control.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GVAlignment &amp;&amp; GV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#ade7dc7510e950cd1c1181138b390f965">hasSection</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;GVAlignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If no explicit alignment is specified, compute the alignment based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the IR type. If an alignment is specified, increase it to match the ABI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment of the IR type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Not sure it makes sense to use the alignment of the type if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there&#39;s already an explicit alignment specification.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ElemType = GV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#af1dd2acfc2950742e41a64a342b15c80">getValueType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#af9185c7e96873c6d2c13e1f1b6322cf6">getPrefTypeAlign</a>(ElemType);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GVAlignment) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;GVAlignment &gt;= Alignment)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Alignment = &#42;GVAlignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Alignment = std::max(&#42;GVAlignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#a800e74bec9b78d6739665027c3616a55">getABITypeAlign</a>(ElemType));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If no explicit alignment is specified, and the global is large, increase</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the alignment to 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Why 16, specifically?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a1c66d4eff947253e7610a66379974d63">hasInitializer</a>() &amp;&amp; !GVAlignment) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Alignment &lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(16)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the global is not external, see if it is large.  If so, give it a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// larger alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#acf0b1898efd7f81a078e9288befd9290">getTypeSizeInBits</a>(ElemType) &gt; 128)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(16); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 16-byte alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
